commit.message: Turned off dumping database state during tests execution.

modified.diff:
@@ -10,18 +10,13 @@
 
   <container qualifier="glassfish-embedded" default="true">
     <configuration>
-      <!-- 
-      <property name="configurationXml">file:////home/bmajsak/dev/workspace/jboss/arquillian/arquillian-extension-persistence/impl/src/test/resources/glassfish-config.xml</property>
-       -->
       <property name="sunResourcesXml">src/test/resources-glassfish-3.1/glassfish-resources.xml</property>
       <property name="bindHttpPort">9090</property>
     </configuration>
   </container>
 
   <extension qualifier="persistence">
-    <property name="defaultDataSource">arq/hsql</property>
-    <property name="dumpData">true</property>
-    <property name="dumpDirectory">/home/bmajsak/db-dumps</property>
+    <property name="defaultDataSource">arq/hsql</property>  
     <property name="initStatement">set referential_integrity FALSE</property>
   </extension>
